{include "first_name"} – The ACLU of Indiana is thrilled to invite you to the first ever LGBTQ+ Statehouse Day on Monday, February 3. This day of action will bring together members of the LGBTQ+ community, service providers, community organizations, supporters, and law makers to discuss the experiences and needs of LGBTQ+ Hoosiers.

LGBTQ+ Statehouse Day

Monday, February 3

Itinerary:
10:30 – 11:30 a.m. Resource Fair
11:30 – Noon Lunch
